file_content.text: Ow. What... I... I lost?
I can't lose. I'm Sith!
You were Sith. Now, you're just done.
Not anymore.
Someone's been filling your head with garbage.
You poor deluded girl.
No wonder your father wants you dead.
Blast, you're annoying.
Wait! I can't die like this... falling to some common bounty hunter!
Everything Lord Grathan told me was a lie. I've been living in a dream world....
It can't end like this... it can't.
You're not the first Sith who died from arrogance, and you won't be the last.
Actually, it can. [Kill her]
I feel for you, girl. Close your eyes, now.
I'll do it quick. [Kill her]
I just can't believe it....
It's time you and your father had a chat.
It's not ending. [Freeze her]
What? No! That's worse!
Oh, what have we here? You're not even a Mandalorian, are you?
When Lord Grathan's spies said my father contacted the Mandalorian enclave, I expected they'd at least send me a real, live Mandalorian.
I'm afraid I'm a tad disappointed.
What does it matter who kills you?
Why?
A woman has to have standards.
You knew your father wanted you killed?
You were expecting me?
Of course. But really, how scary is that?
Wait--you don't seriously think you can kill me? I mean, I'm Sith, and you're just... whatever you are.
Oh, we've got a true believer.
Then again, it makes sense--why would you come here if you thought you'd die?
Apparently, my father isn't the only one living in a dream world. You can't kill a Sith, you silly!
You believe you're invincible, little girl?
You're overconfident.
No, of course not.
Why would your father hire me if you can't be killed?
Then why am I here?
To save face, naturally. Don't you understand how any of this works?
A more powerful Sith could kill me... or a really lucky Jedi, I suppose. Perhaps a bomb... but not some random bounty hunter.
You must be so crushed. Live and learn, I guess. Except, not in your case... sorry!
Why don't we test that theory?
Pretty sure I can. [Attack]
You're going to be more than disappointed.
That's funny. [Attack]
Wonderful! I love that line!
Don't mind me--kill whatever you like.
